CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE - 1977 CODE
This table gives the location within this Code of those sections of the 1977 Code, as updated through December 5, 1994, which are included herein. Sections of the 1977 Code, as supplemented, not listed herein have been omitted as repealed, superseded, obsolete or not of a general and permanent nature. For the location of ordinances adopted subsequent thereto, see the table immediately following this table. For provisions included in the Land Development Code, see the comparative table for same. For an accounting of provisions of the 1977 Code that were repealed or altered by the adoption of this Code, see the memorandum of substantive changes appearing after the Code Comparative Table—Ordinances.
EXPAND
1977 Code

this Code
